comment: Professor Bomely is awesome! His class was super comprehensive and we went through each factor of each paper before we wrote them. Only had a few papers all in all, they aren't long or super difficult. He provides a TON of extra credit, and responds quickly to emails and such. If you put in a little bit of effort then you'll likely make an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Could not have hoped for a better first semester taking English 1101 with Professor Bomely. Go to class and take his advice and all will go well. When you have an essay, make what you write about something you truly care for. It will improve your writing and probably help your grade. He keeps it real and makes class interesting!

Prof. Bomely is great! definitely would take again, he was understand if assignments were missed and made extra credit almost every assignment. He was very friendly and responded quickly online. Only had to do a few papers that we were walked through. Was very comprehensive and explained things at a basic enough level. Would recommend!

Professor Bomely is an amazing professor, would definitely take him again and recommend him to other people. If you pay attention in class, participate a little and do all required assignments the best you can you will do very well. Answers emails fast, very understanding and a good teacher. Only wrote 4 papers for him. TAKE HIM IF YOU CAN.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Bomely is probably one of the best teachers I've ever had. He is super nice and understanding and gives TONS of extra credit. The work is clear and easy to understand and honestly not that hard at all. He seems like one of the few teachers that actually care about their student's education. If you have the opportunity, take his class!
Professor Bomely is honestly so great, he is great about making class entertaining. He gives clear grading expectations and is very fast when responding to emails. Take him if you can?
TAKE THIS CLASS!!! I am in this class right now, and he is the best professor ever! Hes very fast at responding to emails, and very understanding to situations! You will not regret taking this class!

He is very accessible outside of class. His papers have clear-cut criteria almost that you can just look at it and know how to write your papers. He provides extra credit a lot like meetings with the writing center and after every paper. he will also meet with you one on one if you ask to discuss what to do if you want to get your grade up.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT
